text: ءَآلْـَٔـٰنَ وَقَدْ عَصَيْتَ قَبْلُ وَكُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ

translation.en.sahih: Now? And you had disobeyed [Him] before and were of the corrupters?
translation.id.indonesian: Apakah sekarang (baru kamu percaya), padahal sesungguhnya kamu telah durhaka sejak dahulu, dan kamu termasuk orang-orang yang berbuat kerusakan.
